Description: (Picower Institute at MIT) The RPB Walt and Lilly Disney Award for Amblyopia Research will support efforts to develop a new therapeutic approach to the common vision disorder
Title: Mark F Bear earns RPB amblyopia research award

Description: An ardent Indophile s poem on the life of Buddha stirred a rethink on conventional ideas of a philosophy
Title: Embedded in Ambedkar s historiography

Description: A new study says the hulking giants of the deep, North Atlantic right whales, are on average about three feet shorter than just 20 years ago
Title: Shrinking giants North Atlantic right whales getting tinier
Author: SETH BORENSTEIN AP Science Writer
